description: When a rich businessman with a passion for model planes manages to resurrect an old satellite and turn it into an orbiting laser weapon, Najica and Lila are authorized to track him down and gain control of the satellite by any means necessary.

titles.title: Das Grauen lauert in der Finsternis
Shuuaku naru Ibutsu wa Shikkoku no Yami to Tomo ni
Ugly Relics in the Jet Black Darkness
醜悪なる遺物は漆黒の闇と共に
